item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)



【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

4.5
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)

item.content:encoded:
Price: $66.98 - ($58.99 / Count)
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.8 x 4.92 x 1.85 inches; 7.83 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ C61
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089W594LC

★ Quiet and Low Vibration Design: The dog clipper’s noise when working is about 60 db,ensure your pet is comfortable throughout the grooming process,without causing him any discomfort.
★Built-in Battery: Rechargeable by USB with indicator light, make it more convenient,without changing batteries. This nail trimmer can be used for about 2 hours after 2 hours of fully charging.
★Safe and Sharp Blade & Powerful Motor:Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade can provide excellent cutting performance. Works great for trimming small areas like paws,ears and eyes.
★What You Get: oneisall dog clipper set(with one small blade and one middle blade),one cleaning brush,one USB charging cord.

How to remove and install the blade?

1.Remove the blade counter clockwise rotation;

How to remove and install the blade?

2.Pull the blade out;

How to remove and install the blade?

3.Put the blade back to the clipper;

How to remove and install the blade?

4.Install the blade clockwise rotation.

Counter clockwise

Pull out

Put it back

Clockwise

4 Steps to Do Pet Hair Grooming

1. Bathing your dog,keep it clean with no dirt;

2. Grooming with a brush,remove the dirt and knots;

3.Shave dog hairs with oneisall dog clipper.

4.Use the dog trimmer to shave the small area hair.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

Product Description

World Wide Application Garden Tools Set

KOTTO 4 Pack Pruner Shears Garden Cutter Clippers, Stainless Steel Sharp Pruner Secateurs, Professional Bypass Pruning Hand Tools Scissors Kit

[High-Quality Materials] – One piece chrome plated 3Cr13 stainless steel blades for high-strength use, easy to cut branches even wide to 3/4′.
[Labor-Saving] – Slightly curved scissors are ergonomically designed, and the embedded shock-absorbing spring applies pressure to branches during trimming, will save more effort.
[Comfort Handle] – The handle part of the pruning shears made by high-purity PP+TPR plastic, especially the hand grip is very comfortable, but also has strong toughness and strength.
[Exquisite Workmanship] – The blade has been sanded so deter tarnish and rust, its all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears would also help adjust the blades angle.
[Gardening Helper] – Looking for long-lived pruning shear, fruits shear, flower cutter? Those pruning shears could satisfy need of planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, greenhouse pruning.

Package Include:
3 pruner shears and 1 scissor
1 pruner shear 1 folding saw and 1 scissor
2 pruner shears and 1 scissor
3 bonsai scissors
2 garden loppers and 1 pruner shear

Storage Case:
✓
✓
✓
✓
✓

Quality : The blades of our shears gardening tools are made of high quality stainless steel that gives good precision and makes it easy to cut through branches. The ergonomic handle design reduces stress on your wrist and fits for small or big hands to ensure maximum cutting comfort and no-slip grip.
Material : The blade of these garden hand tools has been sanded to deter tarnish and rust, it’s all matched easy-to-use safety lock. The buckle of the bypass pruning shears for gardening would also help adjust the blades angle too.
Comfort : The handle part of the garden scissors/pruning shears/gardening shears/garden clippers is made of high-purity PP+TPR plastic, making the handgrip very comfortable but also tough and strong.
Gardening Helper : These grass shears/pruning scissors/garden pruners could satisfy the need for planting, harvesting, floral, indoor and outdoor planting, and greenhouse pruning.
Customer service : If you have any questions or issues regarding our product, please do not hesitate to send the seller a message through Amazon and we will respond within 24 hours.
Add-ons: We offer a pair of free protection gloves to protect your hands when doing gardening work.

The DEELOKI Pet Nail Grinder gives high ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

DEELOKI aims to “Healthy, Safety and comfortable ” life for pets. We all know that trimming pet nails is not an easy work, this unique pet nail grinder is specially made for pets with whisper quiet, fast and painless trimming.

The DEELOKI Pet Nail Grinder gives high performance grinding through any pets size.Lightweight with ultralight vibration it has amazing noise absorption.Your pet will love this amazingly simple solution to claw maintenance.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.07 x 3.07 x 2.22 inches; 12.45 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 7, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DEELOKI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BDDZXMPS

【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

4.5
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:31 UTC – Details)

oneisall

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Safe and Sharp Blade. Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance. The blade sharp enough for a long time using. Detachable blades,easy to change and clean.
Low vibration and ultra quiet design.The noise when working is only about 50 db, to help the pet feel at ease, not afraid cut hair any more.
6 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
Please Note: if your pets get long and thick hair, you need to use scissors cut shorter at first, otherwise the clippers may jam up and don’t work properly.

Safe and Sharp Blade

Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance and long life.

Wireless and Rechargeable

Rechargeable dog clippers with built-in battery. It can be used cordless and also used when charging.

Detachable Blades

Detachable blade for ease of changing and cleaning,which offer ultimate grooming versatility.

Make Grooming Easy

Inclued a stainless steel scissor,a stainless steel comb,a oil bottle and 6 guide guards (3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm,15mm and 18mm).

Update-To avoid misleading,the Charging light will not turn from red green after fully charged.The charging time is estimated to be 5hours. Also the battery is lithium batter that has no battery memory effect, which means there is no negative effect if you charge half of the battery capacity.
Sminiker Rechargeable Cordless Dog Grooming Clippers Sminiker clipper set keeps your pets always looking good, it’s very useful both in home and profession salon use! Complete new user friendly, with limiting comb this clipper ensure you a safe cutting and neat and tidy hair result. No more expensive bills for pet grooming and you can do it in an easy way.

Specification: Input Power: 100V-240V 50/60Hz
Dimension: 45*175mm
Charging time: 4-5 hours
Using time: 60-70 mins
Net weight: 650g
Power cord length: about 175cm
Accessories: 3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm Limiting combs (used for adjusting hair length), an adapter, a cleaning brush

Package Includes: 1 x Sminiker Pet clipper
1 x US AC Power Adapter
1 x Rechargeable Battery
1 x Cleaning Brush for Clipper
1 x Stainless Flat scissors
4 x Limiting Combs
1 x Manual
1 × Nail Clipper Kit
1 × Nail File
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.1 x 2.4 x 10.7 inches; 1 Pounds
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 2 AA batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 21, 2016
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01D8KIBYU
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Titanium acute-angle blade combining with the ceramic movable blade for smooth and efficient cutting for cats dogs rabbits horse……
New user friendly, we provide 3-6-9-12mm level limiting combs with the package. With limiting comb you can safely trim your pet even if you’ve never done it before. Mobile titanium blade is adjustable ranging from 2mm- 0.9mm for slight adjustment on hair length.
Precision motor, low vibration and ultra quiet design. Working noise lower than 60 DB, will not scare you pet.
Cordless design for easy use. The pet grooming kit is equipped with a charger. Charging for five hours, it can sustain uses of 70 minutes.

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 1

It’s not easy to trim the whole face. You can try to start with the dog’s eyebrows. Scissors should not be pointed at the eyes, so as not to hurt the eyes when the dog is in disorder.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 2

Lip edges and long mandibular hair are useless and can affect the appearance. They should be cut off. When pruning, press its lips first, so as not to cause damage by sudden turbulence.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 3

Pay attention to trimming the dog’s ear hairs. Hollowing out the inner hair of the ear can make the dog feel as comfortable as possible in the hot summer.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 4

Trim the ear properly. If you want it to look round, don’t cut it too short around the ear roots, depending on your preferences.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.31 x 5.51 x 2.8 inches; 15.84 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 30, 2007
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Highdas
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07SSRDCHT

★RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES – Rechargeable clippers can make it flexible for you. It is no problem to use when charging, don’t worry, and it is safe and will not stop working.
★SAFE AND SHARP BLADE – It is suitable for the most skin-friendly grooming experience, and thanks to the precision-cut titanium blades, there’s no uncomfortable pulling at your pet’s hair.
★EASY TO USE AND ADJUSTABLE – We have 4 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
★PAY ATTENTION – Using the scissors to cut the hair shorter first if your pet has a extremely long and thick hair cause it will make the clippers get stuck and stop working.

item.title: GHG Dog Nail Grinder Upgraded – Professional LED Lighting 3-Speed Rechargeable Pet Nail Trimmer with Clippers, Quiet Low Noise, Paws Grooming and Smoothing for Small Medium Large Dogs and Cats

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light

Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor

GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you to trim their claws . You can trim your pets nails professionally at home without any stress.

Get used to grinder

Step 1: Turn on the grinder and accustom your dog to the sound and smell, to avoid scaring your pet. Once your pets get used to it, the grinding work will be easy.

Cut the long nail

Step 2: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails.

Apply the grinder

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 60 oblique, Put pet’s nail gently into port hole with your fingers.

Reward your pet

Step 4: After finishing grinding, reward your pet with pet snacks it will have a good memory of the nail grinder.

Appropriate Angle

The perfect time to do claw grooming work after bathing, because their nails would be softer than usual and easier to trim. 45 degrees is a perfect angle for you to smooth pet’s nails.

（Do not sharpen one nail for too long to avoid heat buildup）

Low Noise Grinder

Our pet nail grinder has powerful motor with low noise and vibration will won’t scare your dog. 3 ports and Low-Normal-High speed are enough for all sizes of pet nails and heavy grinding.

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1

Pet Nail Clippers * 1

USB Charging Cable * 1

User Manual * 1

Different Ports * 2

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 1.3 x 1.2 inches; 13.12 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 11, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GHG
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08SMD5DMD

SUPER LOW NOISE AND VIBRATION: Used as puppy nail grinder & cat nail trimmers, GHG nail grinder for pets won’t scare your canine. Enjoy grooming at home with GHG pet nail grinder for dogs quiet(＜40dB).
BUILT-IN LED LIGHT & LIGHTWEIGHT: A special LED light below the dog nail grinder shines on your pet’s claw so you can see it better, preventing over-grinding or cutting, portable and smart design.
UP TO 10H WORKING TIME: GHG nail grinders trimmer for dogs with convenient micro-USB charging, and its super long-life rechargeable battery-operated dog nail trimmer for easier at-home grooming.
1 NAIL CLIPPER & 1 ELECTRIC NAIL TRIMMER: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails, and flexibly choose the right port and speed according to the pet’s size and nail hardness.

GHG Dog Nail Grinder with LED Light

Safe and Fast, Professional 3-speed with super strong motor

GHG Pet Nail Grinder Kit is easy to grip, light weight, friendly design with a power engine and perfect for grinding all sizes of cats and dogs. Pet nail clippers help you to trim their claws . You can trim your pets nails professionally at home without any stress.
